attributes.additional_details:
This petition calls for the Department of Health to tackle the increasing prevalence of obesity of NHS employees - nurses, doctors, etc.

All NHS staff should have a 'health appraisal' to ensure that their staff are health e.g. bmi, blood presssure, etc.

One impact of this will be reduced costs to the NHS through days off sick.
